languages.text: "Для того ты на техномата и выучился. Поставь свечку за здравие Лорд-капитана, это {mf|его|ее} заботами мы полезнее для отсека стали".

traits.locale_text: "Для того ты на техноманта и выучился. Поставь свечку за здравие Лорд-капитана, это {mf|его|ее} заботами мы полезнее для отсека стали".

languages.text: "That's why you trained to be a technomat. Light a candle for the Lord Captain's health — it's thanks to {mf|his|her} concern that we've become more useful to the bay."
languages.original_text: "Для того ты на техномата и выучился. Поставь свечку за здравие Лорд-капитана, это {mf|его|ее} заботами мы полезнее для отсека стали".

traits.locale_text: "That's why you trained to be a technomat. Light a candle for the Lord Captain's health — it's thanks to {mf|his|her} concern that we've become more useful to the bay."
"That's why you trained to be a technomat. Light a candle for the Lord Captain's health — it's thanks to {mf|his|her} concern that we've become more useful to the bay."
"That's why you trained to be a technomat. Light a candle for the Lord Captain's health — it's thanks to {mf|his|her} concern that we've become more useful to the bay."
"That's why you trained to be a technomat. Light a candle for the Lord Captain's health — it's thanks to {mf|his|her} concern that we've become more useful to the bay."
"That's why you trained to be a technomat. Light a candle for the Lord Captain's health — it's thanks to {mf|his|her} concern that we've become more useful to the bay."

languages.text: «Para eso te han formado como tecnómata. Enciende una vela en honor {mf|al|a la} Lord Capitán, que si no fuera por sus desvelos, este compartimento se habría ido al garete».
languages.original_text: "That's why you trained to be a technomat. Light a candle for the Lord Captain's health — it's thanks to {mf|his|her} concern that we've become more useful to the bay."

traits.locale_text: «Para eso te han formado como tecnómata. Enciende una vela en honor {mf|al|a la} Lord Capitán, que si no fuera por sus desvelos, este compartimento se habría ido al garete».

languages.text: 「だからテクノマットの訓練を受けたんだろう。ロード・キャプテンの健康のためにロウソクを灯そう。このベイで私たちが役に立つようにしてくれたのは、陛下のお陰なのだから」
languages.original_text: "That's why you trained to be a technomat. Light a candle for the Lord Captain's health — it's thanks to {mf|his|her} concern that we've become more useful to the bay."

traits.locale_text: 「だからテクノマットの訓練を受けたんだろう。ロード・キャプテンの健康のためにロウソクを灯そう。このベイで私たちが役に立つようにしてくれたのは、陛下のお陰なのだから」

languages.text: “他们把你训练成技工，就是为了这样的结果。为舰长大人的健康祈祷吧，多亏了{mf|他|她}的照顾，我们才能为这片甲板发挥更大作用。”
languages.original_text: "That's why you trained to be a technomat. Light a candle for the Lord Captain's health — it's thanks to {mf|his|her} concern that we've become more useful to the bay."

traits.locale_text: “他们把你训练成技工，就是为了这样的结果。为舰长大人的健康祈祷吧，多亏了{mf|他|她}的照顾，我们才能为这片甲板发挥更大作用。”

languages.text: "Deshalb wurdest du zum Technomaten ausgebildet. Zünde für die Gesundheit des Lord Captains eine Kerze an ... dank {mf|ihm|ihr} sind wir für die Bucht nützlicher geworden."
languages.original_text: "That's why you trained to be a technomat. Light a candle for the Lord Captain's health — it's thanks to {mf|his|her} concern that we've become more useful to the bay."

traits.locale_text: "Deshalb wurdest du zum Technomaten ausgebildet. Zünde für die Gesundheit des Lord Captains eine Kerze an ... dank {mf|ihm|ihr} sind wir für die Bucht nützlicher geworden."

languages.text: « Comme quoi, ta formation de technomate a porté ses fruits. Allume donc un cierge à la santé {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}. Après tout, c'est grâce à {mf|lui|elle} qu'on est devenus indispensables au fonctionnement de la baie. »
languages.original_text: "That's why you trained to be a technomat. Light a candle for the Lord Captain's health — it's thanks to {mf|his|her} concern that we've become more useful to the bay."

traits.locale_text: « Comme quoi, ta formation de technomate a porté ses fruits. Allume donc un cierge à la santé {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}. Après tout, c'est grâce à {mf|lui|elle} qu'on est devenus indispensables au fonctionnement de la baie. »

languages.text: "İşte bu yüzden teknomatlık eğitimi aldın. Lord Kaptan'ın şerefine bir mum yak. Bizimle ilgilenmese bölmede daha faydalı olamazdık."
languages.original_text: "That's why you trained to be a technomat. Light a candle for the Lord Captain's health — it's thanks to {mf|his|her} concern that we've become more useful to the bay."
